directions.step:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Toast walnut halves on a cookie sheet until they are fragrant and lightly browned (5 to 10 minutes). Cool completely.
2. In a small bowl work cheese and butter together with a wooden spoon. Sandwich two nut halves with a dab of the cheese mixture. Refrigerate briefly to firm the cheese. Serve cool but not cold.
Makes 3 dozen "bites."
